differences.gitbook: Budget-fitting: we agreed that for Q2, all the admin roles will be allocated less budget; documentation for the 3 meetings in Q2 will be folded in to the co-chair role and done by Vani, so there is no additional cost for that; and we will try to preserve at least some transcription work and some transcript-checking.
differences.supabase: Budget-fitting: we agreed that for Q2, all the admin roles will be allocated less budget; documentation for the 3 meetings in Q2 will be folded in to the co-chair role and done by Vani, so there is no additional cost for that; and we will try to preserve at least some transcription work and some transcript-checking. If token price does rise significantly, we will aim to also do some new interviews. If by the time of our May meeting, token price is still below $0.20, then we will likely need to make even more cuts, as the proposed fitted budget assumes an exchange rate of $0.20
